Origins: On 25 February 2015, the entertainment website National Report published an article claiming that Michelle Obama is set to propose a national "hug a Muslim" day:
Description: While the above-quoted article has been shared thousands of times on Facebook and Twitter, there is no truth to the claim that Michelle Obama is proposing a national "Hug A Musilm" day. A disclaimer on the National Report states that all articles published on the website are completely fictional: National Report is a news and political satire web publication, which may or may not use real names, often in semi-real or mostly fictitious ways. All news articles contained within National Report are fiction, and presumably fake news. Any resemblance to the truth is purely coincidental.
Example: [Collected via Twitter, February 2015] Mooch #Obama to propose "National Hug a Muslim Day." To REPLACE Columbus Day: http://t.co/yEyu5zbwCm pic.twitter.com/sGQiKVAFL9 Resist Tyranny (@ResistTyranny) February 26, 2015
Claim: First Lady Michelle Obama proposed a "Hug A Muslim" day to replace Columbus Day.
